terms.term1: I understand that my funds are held securely on this device, not by a company.
terms.term2: I understand that if this app is moved to another device or deleted, my funds can only be recovered with the recovery phrase.
terms.term3: I have read, understood, and agreed to the Terms of Use.

history.noTransNote: There is no transaction found for this asset

transfer.feeQuestion: How fast do you want this done?
transfer.unavailableAddress: The wallet address youâ€™ve entered is not valid

add.title: Add Wallet
add.importWalletNote: Restore your wallet using the recovery phrase

recoveryPhrase.title: Recovery Phrase
recoveryPhrase.note1: Write down or copy these words
recoveryPhrase.note2: in the right order and save them

verifyPhrase.title: Verify Your Phrase
verifyPhrase.note: Tap each word in the correct order

verifyPhraseSuccess.title: Verify Phrase Success
verifyPhraseSuccess.note: Be sure to store your recovery phrase in a safe and secure place

scan.title: Scan

cameraPermission.title: Permission to use camera
cameraPermission.message: We need your permission to use your camera

scan.unauthorization: Please turn on camera permissions to use this feature.

walletconnect.title: Wallet Connect
walletconnect.timeoutBody: RWallet couldn't establish a Wallet Connect connection to the Dapp within a short timeframe. Please try again. If the problem persist, please delete all browsing data (cookies, cache, etc) on the browser you are using to access the Dapp.
walletconnect.selectMainnetAsset: Please select a wallet that has at least one mainnet rsk asset
walletconnect.selectTestnetAsset: Please select a wallet that has at least one testnet rsk asset
walletconnect.signApprovedDesc: Success! Your message has been signed and it should show in the dapp
walletconnect.agreeTo: Clicking on Allow, you agree to,
walletconnect.agreeTwo: - Allow signature request from the current wallet
walletconnect.waitingForOperationsDesc: Please perform any operations from the %{dappName} dapp. RWallet will prompt to ask for signature approval, if requested.
walletconnect.approveAllowanceDesc: By clicking on Confirm, you agree to allow %{dappUrl} to execute smart contract calls on your behalf.
walletconnect.leaveToDisconnectDesc: Leaving Wallet Connect page will disconnect RWallet from the current connected Dapp.
walletconnect.disconnectAlertContent:
The Wallet Connect connection to the Dapp "%{dappName}" is closed. This may be because of weak network access, or the Dapp rejected the wallet directly for some reason.

By clicking the button below you will be returned to the wallet dashboard.
walletconnect.errorDesc: Error! An error occurred, please try again later (there may be many reasons, such as network problems, user rejection, incorrect passcode, insufficient handling fee, etc.)
walletconnect.approveMessageDesc: By clicking on Confirm, you agree to sign the message originated from %{dappUrl}
walletconnect.successDesc: Success! Your transaction has been published to blockchain. Once confirmed, it should show in the dapp.
walletconnect.approveTransactionDesc: By clicking on Confirm, you agree to sign the transaction originated from %{dappUrl}
walletconnect.approveSmartContractDesc: By clicking on Confirm, you agree to sign the smart contract call originated from %{dappUrl}

networkQuestion.title: Network
networkQuestion.body: The testnet is an alternative RSK block chain, to be used for testing.

transferCompleted.title: Send
transferCompleted.note: Your transaction is on its way.

swap.title: Swap

errorAmountInRange.tooBig: The amount is higher than the exchange maximum of %{max} %{symbol}
errorAmountInRange.tooSmall: The amount is lower than the exchange minimum of %{min} %{symbol}

swap.errorBalanceEnough: Sorry, but you don't have enough balance

swapSelection.title: Select Asset
swapSelection.noSwappableCoin: Sorry, you don't have any Swappable Asset

swapCompleted.title: Swap
swapCompleted.note: Your Exchange is on its way.

addCustomTokenConfirm.title: Add Custom Assets
addCustomTokenConfirm.question: Would you like to add this asset?

addToken.title: Add Asset
addToken.note: Disable assets to hide them from your portfolio.

rnsCreateName.title: Create Nickname
rnsCreateName.nameUnavailable: Sorry, The nickname entered is not available

confirmNotice.one: Please confirm that you would like to create nicknames for below 1 wallet.
confirmNotice.other: Please confirm that you would like to create nicknames for below {{count}} wallets.

rnsStatus.failed: Failed! Your nickname is failed to register.

addReadOnlyWallet.title: Add Read-only Wallet
addReadOnlyWallet.note: Please enter a BTC, RBTC wallet address or RNS name to be monitored.
addReadOnlyWallet.question: We found below assets in this wallet. Would you like to monitor this address?
addReadOnlyWallet.rnsQuestion: We found the wallet address and below assets. Would you like to monitor this address?
addReadOnlyWallet.rnsInvalid: Sorry, the RNS name is not associated with a wallet address on Rootstock blockchain. Please try again.
addReadOnlyWallet.duplicateAddress: This address is already imported in the app. Please try with a different address.

dapp.title: DApp

browser.errorContent: An unknown error occurred, please try again later

dapp.backMessage: You are leaving the dapp, are you sure want to exist?

keyName.title: Wallet Name
keyName.question: What do you call this wallet?
keyName.notice: You can change the name displayed on the device below.
keyName.name: Name
keyName.comment: * Wallet name can contain 1-%{maxLength} letters (a-z), numbers (0-9), and space

rename.title: Your Name
rename.question: What's your name?
rename.comment: * Name can contain 1-%{maxLength} letters (a-z), numbers (0-9), and space

unableRecover.title: Unable to recover
unableRecover.body: We are unable to import a wallet with your recovery phrase. Please make sure the phrase is correct.

duplicatePhrase.title: Duplicate Phrase
duplicatePhrase.body: This phrase is already imported in the app. Please try with a different phrase.

tooManyPhrase.title: Too Many Words
tooManyPhrase.body: The recovery phrase has to be 12 words.

amountExceeds.title: Not enough balance
amountExceeds.body: The amount entered exceeds the wallet's balance

txFailed.title: Transfer is failed
txFailed.moreBTC: You need more BTC balance to complete the transfer
txFailed.moreRBTC: You need more RBTC balance to complete the transfer
txFailed.moreRIF: You need more RIF balance to complete the transfer
txFailed.moreBalance: You need more balance to complete the transfer

guardPhrase.title: Safeguard your recovery phrase
guardPhrase.body: Your recovery phrase is composed of 12 randomly selected words. Please carefully write down each word in the order they appear.

incorrectBackupPhrase.title: Incorrect backup phrase
incorrectBackupPhrase.body: It's important that you write your recovery phrase down correctly. If something happens to your wallet, you'll need it to recover your money. Please review and try again.

phraseCopied.title: Copied
phraseCopied.body: The recovery phrase has been copied to the clipboard.

addressCopied.title: Copied
addressCopied.body: The address has been copied to the clipboard.

subdomainCopied.title: Copied
subdomainCopied.body: The nickname has been copied to the clipboard.

txIdCopied.title: Copied
txIdCopied.body: The Transaction ID has been copied to the clipboard.

passcode.oldIncorrect: Old Passcode is incorrect, try again
passcode.notMatched: Passcode does not match. Please try again.

fingerprint.title: Touch Sensor
fingerprint.nativeNote: Scan your fingerprint on the device scanner to continue
fingerprint.notMatch: Fingerprint does not match. Please try again.

faceID.title: Face ID
faceID.nativeNote: Please aim at the camera for face recognition
faceID.notMatch: FaceID does not match. Please try again.

biometrics.title: Biometrics
biometrics.notMatch: Biometrics does not match. Please try again.

createPasscode.title: Please set a passcode
createPasscode.body: Passcode can protect your funds if this device is stolen or compromised by malicious software.

deleteWallet.title: Warning!
deleteWallet.body: Are you sure you want to delete this wallet?

deleteReadOnlyWallet.title: Warning!
deleteReadOnlyWallet.body: Are you sure you want to delete this Read-only wallet?

swap.title: No swappable coin
swap.body: Swap supports BTC, RBTC and DOC. Please add asset.

contractNotFound.title: ERC20 Contract Not Found
contractNotFound.body: We cannot find the input ERC20 token smart contract. Please check if it is right.

duplicateToken.title: Duplicate Token
duplicateToken.body: This token is already added in the wallet. Please try with a different token.

dappWarning.title: Redirecting to third-party Dapp "%{dappName}"
dappWarning.body: %{description}Note: You will be redirected to a thrid-party Dapp "%{dappName}". Please go through the User Agreement and Privacy Policy of the third-party Dapp carefully. "%{dappName}" will reserve full responsibility for all actions and usage on the Dapp.

noWalletAvailable.title: No Wallet Available
noWalletAvailable.body: There is no wallet available for this Dapp yet. Please navigate to Wallet Creation page to either create or import a wallet first.

requestTimeout.title: Request timeout
requestTimeout.body: The server could not complete the request within the specified time.

rnsNameUnavailable.title: RNS nickname unavailable
rnsNameUnavailable.body: Below entered nicknames are unavailable. Please try again with different nicknames.

rnsSubdomainNotFound.title: RNS Nickname Not Found
rnsSubdomainNotFound.body: RNS nickname is not found in server.

rnsNewFeature.title: Send & Receive got easier
rnsNewFeature.body: We've launched support for RNS, or RIF Name Service which enables the identification of blockchain addresses by human-readable names.

balanceInvalid.title: Wallet balance is not available
balanceInvalid.body: We are having problem retrieving your wallet balance. Please try again later.

InvalidTokenSymbol.title: Invalid token symbol
InvalidTokenSymbol.body: A same token symbol already exists on this blockchain.

rnsExceeded.title: Maximum number reached
rnsExceeded.body: No more than {{count}} nicknames can be created per day.

readOnlyWallet.title: Read-only Wallet
readOnlyWallet.body:
Read-only Wallet feature allows you to monitor assets on blockchain without importing private keys.

Currently allowed inputs are Bitcoin address (both SegWit and Legacy), Rootstock address, or RNS nickname.

readOnlyLimit.title: Operation not available
readOnlyLimit.body: Send, Swap and Scan QR Code operations are not available for a Read-only wallet. To enable those, please Import this wallet with its 12-word phrases.

httpIsNotAllowed.title: URL not allowed
httpIsNotAllowed.body: In order to protect users from unsafe websites, RWallet browser allows only URLs with HTTPS encryption. Please make sure the URL entered start with https://

feeCalculationError.title: Fee calculation error
feeCalculationError.body: An error occurred while calculating the cost. Please try again.

invalidRskAddress.title: Invalid RSK Address

body.normal: The entered recipient address is an invalid RSK address. Please make sure the recipient address is valid RSK address, and verify it on %{explorerName} before sending.
body.ethereum: The entered recipient address seems to be an Ethereum address. This is a known issue when copying addresses from MetaMask. Please make sure the recipient address is valid RSK address, and verify it on %{explorerName} before sending.

invalidRskAddress.question: Why are you seeing this message?

body.normal: The entered recipient address has no record in %{explorerName}, and has %{balance} %{otherSymbolName} on RSK %{otherType} network. Are you sure about sending %{amount} %{symbolName} to the address on RSK %{type}?
body.both: The entered recipient address has no record in %{explorerName}. Are you sure about sending %{amount} %{symbolName} to the address on RSK %{type}?

convertWalletAddress.title: Invalid RSK wallet address
convertWalletAddress.body: The entered wallet address is an invalid RSK address. RWallet will try to auto-correct it into the expected address format. Do you want to proceed?

convertContractAddress.title: Invalid RSK contract address
convertContractAddress.body: The entered contract address is an invalid RSK address. RWallet will try to auto-correct it into the expected address format. Do you want to proceed?

networkError.title: Network Error
networkError.body: Your device can not connect to the server.
